Caldwell.Shirley Englehorn Invitational: The Shirley Englehorn Invitational was a women's professional golf tournament for three seasons on the LPGA Tour, from 1966 to 1968. It was played at the Purple Sage Golf Course in Idaho, north of Caldwell. LPGA Tour player Shirley Englehorn, a Caldwell native, hosted the tournament and won in 1967 in a playoff.
